author: Defense World Staff
title: US Vegan Climate ETF (NYSEARCA:VEGN) Shares Up 0.4% - Defense World
text: US Vegan Climate ETF ( [NYSEARCA:VEGN](https://www.marketbeat.com/stocks/NYSEARCA/VEGN/) – [Get Free Report](https://www.marketbeat.com/arnreports/ReportTickerOptin.aspx?RegistrationCode=TickerHyperlink&Prefix=NYSEARCA&Symbol=VEGN))’s share price traded up 0.4% during mid-day trading on Thursday . The stock traded as high as $45.49 and last traded at $45.49. 6,697 shares changed hands during mid-day trading, an increase of 25% from the average session volume of 5,347 shares. The stock had previously closed at $45.31. US Vegan Climate ETF Trading Up 0.4 % The firm has a market capitalization of $85.52 million, a P/E ratio of 20.86 and a beta of 1.10. The company has a 50 day simple moving average of $43.46 and a two-hundred day simple moving average of $40.58. About US Vegan Climate ETF The US Vegan Climate ETF (VEGN) is an exchange-traded fund that is based on the US Vegan Climate index. The fund seeks to track a principles-based index of U.S. equities weighted by market-cap. VEGN was launched on Sep 9, 2019 and is managed by Beyond.
